body:
I suffered from this issue as well. I've not investigated it thoroughly, but entering the credentials, then restarting the app eventually worked for me.

The issue resurfaced every time I upgraded ST or made other large changes to the configuration, and went away by the same method.

I've also asked a few admins at the local university, who all told me that there is no reliable fix and to just live with it and hope it does away.
title: SourceTree Keeps Asking for Credentials for GitHub
